How to install the Subversive plugin used to download and upload code. 

#1. Open Eclipse
#2. Go to Help->Software Updates->Find and Install...
#3. Select "Search for new features to install" and click next
#4. Click "New Remote Site"
#5. Name it whatever you want and use the url "http://www.polarion.org/projects/subversive/download/1.1/update-site/"  Click ok, then finish.
#6. Select the Subversive features you want to install and click finish.  The plugin should now be installed and restart eclipse.
